message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.SY

This paper is about reinforcement learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper proposes a new method for exploration in reinforcement learning, which is a common problem in the field. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), which covers a broad range of topics related to machine learning. 

The paper also discusses the use of deep reinforcement learning and its application to Atari games, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). 

The proposed method involves balancing the chosen time of each action in each state, which is related to optimization and control. Therefore, it could also belong to cs.RO (Robotics and Control). 

The experiments in the paper involve visual inputs, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision). 

Finally, the paper proposes a method that takes both parts of exploration into consideration, which could also be related to cs.SY (Systems and Control).
